title: AI adoption rate is declining among large companies — US Census Bureau claims fewer businesses are using AI tools
summary: Despite continuing hype around AI, and companies scrambling to keep up with manufacturing, a recent survey says that large companies have started to use AI less. The latest U.S. Census Bureau BTOS reveals that AI use among firms with more than 250 employees has a declined since June.
